rules.name: Fire Storm
rules.effect: This Model can fire twice if it remained stationary during its turn (including Overwatch).

rules.name: Relentless Advance
rules.effect: This Model does not suffer any penalty to its hit rolls for Advancing and firing Assault weapons.

rules.name: Rites of War
rules.effect: Friendly modells within 6” may re-roll hit rolls of 1.

rules.name: Jink
rules.effect: Gain a 4+ invulnerable save against shooting attacks if you advanced (lasts until the next movement phase)

rules.name: Turbo-boost
rules.effect: When this model Advances, add 6” to its Move instead of rolling a dice.

rules.name: Helix Adept Amendment
rules.effect: At the end of any of your Movement phases, select a friendly INFANTRY or BIKER model within 3” that died the previous turn. On a 5+ this model is returned with 1 wound remaining. Otherwise the Adept can do nothing else for the remainder of the turn. You can instead choose a wounded model: it immediately regains 1 lost wounds.

rules.name: Smoke Grenade
rules.effect: One use only Instead of Shooting choose a point within 8”. Until the start of your next turn, enemy models subtract 1 from their shooting hit rolls when targeting friendly units within 3” of this point. Models can draw line of sight into and out of the affected area, but not through it.

rules.name: Bonding Knife Ritual
rules.effect: If you roll a 6 when taking a Morale test, the test is automatically passed.

rules.name: Damaged Jetpack
rules.effect: When this model has 1 or 2 wounds remaining, it loses the Fly and Jet Pack Keywords.

rules.name: Field Amplifier Relay
rules.effect: Replace STRIKE TEAM with BREACHER TEAM keyword

rules.name: Damaged Generator
rules.effect: When this model has 1 or 2 wounds remaining, all natural 1’s to hit made with a ranged weapon by this model result in a single automatic AP -2 with a damage of 1.

rules.name: Saviour Protocols
rules.effect: If an INFANTRY or BATTLESUIT model within 3” of this model is wounded roll a D6. On a 2+ you can allocate that wound to this model instead. If you do, this model suffers a mortal wound instead of the normal damage.

rules.name: Threat Identification Protocols
rules.effect: In the Shooting phase, this model can only target the nearest visible enemy model (choose which one if two or more models are equally close).

rules.name: Shield Generator
rules.effect: Gains a 4+ invulnerable save. Roll a D6 each time this model loses a wound; on a 5+ ignore that wound.

rules.name: Advanced Bionics
rules.effect: Gains a 5+ invulnerable save.

rules.name: Bionics
rules.effect: Gains a 6+ invulnerable save.

rules.name: Master of Machines
rules.effect: At the end of your Movement you may repair another single friendly <FORGE WORLD> model within 3”. It regains D3 lost wounds. A model may not be the target of the Master of Machines ability more than once per turn.

rules.name: Noospheric Fulcrum
rules.effect: Friendly <FORGE WORLD> Units within 6” may re-roll hit rolls of 1 in the Shooting phase.

rules.name: Magos Retiarius
rules.effect: Gain +1 BS. This model gains Two Ballistic mechadendrites which ignore their -1 to BS rule. In addition, this model may take a Volkite blaster or an eradication ray.

rules.name: Canticles of the Omnissiah
rules.effect: See the codex for this rule.

rules.name: Heavy Battle Servitor
rules.effect: Gains a 6+ invulnerable save.

rules.name: Thermal Shed
rules.effect: Gains a 6+ invulnerable save.

rules.name: Heavy Tracks
rules.effect: Gains a 6+ invulnerable save.

rules.name: Magos Biologis
rules.effect: Gains a 6+ invulnerable save.

ArmyRules.name: Grim Resolve
ArmyRules.effect: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this model whenever it shoots (including Overwatch) as long as it remains stationary.

ArmyRules.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
ArmyRules.effect: Re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

ArmyRules.name: Chapter Tactics: Novamarines
ArmyRules.effect: Re-roll failed wound rolls of 1 when attacking a model that do not have the IMPERIUM or CHAOS keyword.

ArmyRules.name: Defenders of Humanity
ArmyRules.effect: If a model is in range of an objective marker it controls the marker even if there are more enemy models within range.

ArmyRules.name: For the Greater Good
ArmyRules.effect: Increase the range for firing Overwatch to 6”.

ArmyRules.name: Agripinaa – Staunch Defenders
ArmyRules.effect: When firing Overwatch, hit on a roll of 5+.

ArmyRules.name: Soldiers of the Machine God
ArmyRules.effect: If a model is in range of an objective marker it controls the marker even if there are more enemy models within range.

Philosophies.name: Unwavering Zeal
Philosophies.text: If you are the first player to fail a Morale test including Nerve test, you lose 2 TP.

Philosophies.name: Quick Reaction Force
Philosophies.text: No model on your team may be equipped with Heavy weapons.

Philosophies.name: One Track Mind
Philosophies.text: Before the game, you choose a single Tactical Action available to you. You may only use that Tactical Action in the game. You may choose different Tactical Actions for each game

Philosophies.name: A More Subtle Touch
Philosophies.text: Your team contains no units with the SKITARII keyword.
